intro: Fight for survival in the Wild West!
description:
In a world where the undead have taken over the Wild West, it's up to you to fight back. As a brave cowboy, you'll embark on an epic adventure to survive the zombie outbreak, unlocking powerful characters, weapons, and pets along the way.

-Start your adventure as our valiant cowboy, and unlock 9 unique characters, each with their own backstory and skills.

-Create 400 unique builds based on perks that will empower your weapons, create devastating explosions, summon elemental magic like lightning, fire and ice.

-Choose a loyal pet companion to fight alongside you. Each pet has special abilities, some will empower your weapons and skills and some have unique skills of their own.

-Face hordes of zombies, unique elites and bosses that will test your shooting, dodging and strategic thinking.

-Diverse, random locations starting from abandoned towns and graveyards in the wild west and finishing with dark mines and mysterious forests. Each location has unique enemies, challenges and secrets to discover.

-Vast Weaponry, beginning from classic revolvers and rifles to unique firearms like the Tesla gun. Choose from a vast array of weapons to suit your style and complement your build.

-Collect resources and XP from each location to upgrade your characters, pets, skills, and weapons. Strengthen your arsenal to face tougher enemies.

-Stunning graphics and a captivating soundtrack that transport you straight into the heart of the Wild West zombie apocalypse.

-Complete missions and challenges to earn rewards and unlock new locations, enemies and bosses.

Cowboys vs Zombies is not just a top down western roguelike action; it's a battle for the survival of the Wild West. You are the only chance for this world. Do you have what it takes to survive the onslaught and escape the clutches of the undead?
